item.title: [RS2] AFK Trainer
item.dc:creator: @darkarmy darkarmy
item.description:
@darkarmy wrote:

[quote="!!1one!eleven1!, post:1, topic:2604"]I made this because i got sick of getting logged off while i was doing homework when i was fishing.

This will keep you logged in while your AFK.

[code]program AFK;
{.include SSI2.txt}
var
num:integer;

procedure operation(number:Integer);
begin
case number of
1:begin MMouse(560,210,180,210);wait(1000+Random(2500)) end;//Move Mouse Randomly in stats box
2:begin Mouse(5,5,510,335,false);wait(1000+Random(1000)) end;//Right click randomly in game window
100:begin Mouse(575,175,20,15,True);wait(Random(1000)) end;//Click on Stats Icon
200:begin GameTab(random(7));wait(150+random(500));GameTab(4) end;//Click on random icon then back to inventory
300:begin Mouse(630,175,20,15,True) end;//Click on inventory icon
end;
end;

Procedure AFK;
Begin
num:= Random(10)
if(num >=5)then
begin
operation(100)
while(num >= 5) do
begin
operation(Random(3))
num:= Random(10)
end
operation(300)
end
else
begin
operation(200)
end
End;

begin
Repeat
AFK;
Wait(20000+Random(10000))
Until(False)
end.[/code][/quote]

I fixed your script a lil bit.
it still has sum problems though

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = AFKtrainter

Author = !!1one!eleven1!

Description =

Version = 1.2

Date =

Comments = not mine

/Script Info}
program AFK;
{.include SSI2.txt}
var
num:integer;

procedure operation(number:Integer);
begin
case number of
1:begin MMouse(560,210,180,210);wait(1000+Random(2500)) end;//Move Mouse Randomly in stats box
2:begin Mouse(5,5,510,335,false);wait(1000+Random(1000)) end;//Right click randomly in game window
100:begin Mouse(575,175,20,15,True);wait(Random(1000)) end;//Click on Stats Icon
200:begin GameTab(random(7));wait(150+random(500));GameTab(4) end;//Click on random icon then back to inventory
300:begin Mouse(630,175,20,15,True) end;//Click on inventory icon
end;
end;

Procedure AFK;
Begin
num:= Random(10)
if(num >=5)then
begin
operation(100)
while(num >= 5) do
begin
operation(Random(3))
num:= Random(10)
end;
operation(300)
end;
else
begin
operation(200)
end;
End;

begin
Repeat
AFK;
Wait(20000+Random(10000))
Until(False)
end.[/code]

item.title: [RS2] AFK Trainer
item.dc:creator: @Duncan Duncan
item.description:
@Duncan wrote:

[quote=“HDKilla, post:11, topic:2604”][quote author=Duncan link=topic=2849.msg162337#msg162337 date=1155845002]

What is “AFK”?
[/quote]lol. Away From Computer. If you have trouble with internet terms, google search for the urban dictionary. If you ask about words too much, people will think you are FUBAR.

Its AFK dude, AFK, not AFC…[/quote]

AFK and AFC mean the same thing… and since everything is mispelt on the internet, computer could be spelt |{ 0 //\ p |_| 7 3 r

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] AFK Trainer
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

I made this because i got sick of getting logged off while i was doing homework when i was fishing.

This will keep you logged in while your AFK.

[code]program AFK;
{.include SSI2.txt}
var
num:integer;

procedure operation(number:Integer);
begin
case number of
1:begin MMouse(560,210,180,210);wait(1000+Random(2500)) end;//Move Mouse Randomly in stats box
2:begin Mouse(5,5,510,335,false);wait(1000+Random(1000)) end;//Right click randomly in game window
100:begin Mouse(575,175,20,15,True);wait(Random(1000)) end;//Click on Stats Icon
200:begin GameTab(random(7));wait(150+random(500));GameTab(4) end;//Click on random icon then back to inventory
300:begin Mouse(630,175,20,15,True) end;//Click on inventory icon
end;
end;

Procedure AFK;
Begin
num:= Random(10)
if(num >=5)then
begin
operation(100)
while(num >= 5) do
begin
operation(Random(3))
num:= Random(10)
end
operation(300)
end
else
begin
operation(200)
end
End;

begin
Repeat
AFK;
Wait(20000+Random(10000))
Until(False)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
